channel.title: Wildwood on KrolTech
channel.description: Recent content in Wildwood on KrolTech

item.title: Vacation!!!
item.author: jkat98@gmail.com (Jason Krol)
item.description: VACATION!! Didn’t learn much, but did read up some more on XNA programming in general. Rode a wave runner (jet ski) for the first time and that was exhilarating! (Although it was extremely tiring, and very hard work!) Rode lots of rides, ate like shit, and had a great time!
